title: [Gyldemar Forest, Cobbled Path]
description: A moss-covered outcropping of pale white granite emerges from the forest floor, upsetting the once carefully laid cobblestones.  Its surface has been torn in places, the moss peeled back in tatters as if some mammoth claw had been dragged across it.  Somewhere in the distance, the baying of a wolf resonates in a hollow echo.
